SignIn.signup button: First time here? Let's Sign up

Register.password recommendation:
Password Recommendations:
 - Your password should be at least 8 characters long.
- Include a mix of uppercase and lowercase letters.
- Add at least one numeric digit.
- Add at least one special character.
Register.registration status: You have successfully registered and will now be redirected to the 'Login' page.
Register.registration error (user already exists): User with this email already exists

Successfull Registration.sucreg text: Now use the link thsst we send you via email and finish registration

Resend Email.resend email text:
Massage can get in 'Spam' folder, check it 
 If you didn't get the message, you can try to resend it
